name: Merry's Errands
description:
Enjoy a peaceful day in the life of Merry the Rabbit. Explore the town, talk to your friends, finish your chores, and maybe give a gift to someone you like...? This tiny life sim/dating sim was made in GB Studio and takes 10-15 minutes to play.

CONTROLS
START = ENTER/RETURN
A = Z and B = X (A and B might be switched on some emulators)

Pay $2 or more to download the rom! No .pocket file yet but check back in December!
